<optional title, max 6 words>

<setup: dim room, tense atmosphere>
<optional narration, ≤ 6 words>
Raskolnikov: *She’s still holding the pledge…*

<blank line>

Raskolnikov: *Another blow… more blood…*  
Raskolnikov: *She’s dead. What have I done?*  

---
<setup: small bedroom, eerie silence>
<optional narration, ≤ 6 words>
Raskolnikov: *Keys… in her pocket.*  

<blank line>

Raskolnikov: *Stay calm. Don’t get smeared.*  
Raskolnikov: *The chest… the keys…*  

<blank line>

Raskolnikov: *What if she’s still alive?*  
Raskolnikov: *It’s too late to turn back.*

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Raskolnikov brutally murders the old woman with an axe, confirming her death before searching her belongings.
